Intuit4.6
Distinguished Architect, QB Money
Petah Tikva
Apply on employer site

Overview

Come join Intuit as a Distinguished Engineer, leading architecture initiatives in QuickBooks Money products. Intuit is expanding its social, mobile, and global footprint with a full suite of products and services that are revolutionizing the industry. Utilizing design for delight, and lean startup methodologies, our entrepreneurial employees have brought numerous innovations to market. The breadth and depth of these customer-driven innovations mean limitless opportunities for you to turn your ingenious ideas into reality at Intuit, while powering prosperity around the world.

#LI-Hybrid

What you'll bring

  • 10+ years’ experience designing and leading architectural efforts for web, software or mobile applications
  • Expertise in FinTech and how technology can be used to solve problems (expertise in the Small Business finance space - a plus)
  • Experience with cloud, SaaS, big data, or analytics and machine learning
  • Boundaryless leadership experience: applying the nuances of influencing based on the situation, knowing when to push and when to ease, driving through designs, ideas, and roadmaps.
  • Seasoned and ambidextrous leadership - able to balance short and long, inspire and coach
  • Excellent communication skills: demonstrated ability to present to all levels of leadership, including executives
  • Experience in conceptualizing, launching, and driving business and product strategies and multi-year roadmaps
  • Expertise in modern technology stacks, API design, microservices, public cloud, and designing for resilience and operational excellence
  • Expertise in Agile Development, SCRUM, or Extreme Programming methodologies
  • BS/MS in computer science, or equivalent work experience

How you will lead

  • Provide architectural and people leadership across a number of interdependent engineering teams, architects, systems and offerings.
  • Influence the shaping of future products by contributing to the framework (architecture) used across multiple products or systems. Drive system and platform thinking within development teams
  • Be the technical expert, researching, evaluating, and implementing state-of-the-art technology (open source, third party)
  • Bring deep Payments and Fintech domain expertise and lead the teams through innovation
  • Key member of the team in regards to representing technology-driven opportunities and implications of various business and offering strategies and tactics
  • Strong technical documentation and presentation skills to communicate architectural and design options, educating development teams, business users, and senior leadership
  • Act as an industry thought leader, continuing to share Intuit’s growth story as one of the top SaaS, data-driven, and cloud deployed companies on the web
  • Build strong teams - set and evangelize vision, facilitative leadership, attract and retain key talent. Talent steward for the engineering organization, mentor rising leaders.

Intuit – Why Work With Us

Mission
  • Mission
  • Workplace & Culture
  • Engineering & Data
  • Career Areas
  • Social Impact
Mission
Workplace & Culture
Engineering & Data
Career Areas
Social Impact

Working at Intuit, you’ll be an important part of our mission to power prosperity around the world. We deliver on our mission by working to solve the most important financial problems for the customers and communities we serve. That means helping put more money in their pockets, eliminating work and drudgery so they can focus on their lives and what matters to them, and ensuring that they have complete confidence in every financial decision they make.

Our products and services are built on Intuit's AI-driven expert platform, combining the power of cutting-edge technology with live financial experts. We’re using innovative technologies like AI, Machine Learning, and Natural Language Processing to develop groundbreaking products that deliver simple, delightful solutions across the full range of our customers’ financial lives.

  • TurboTax takes the complexity out of the tax code, helping people get the maximum refund they deserve.
  • Credit Karma helps people find the right financial products, putting more money in their pockets and providing financial expertise and insights.
  • Mint helps users to get a holistic view of their financial picture and make smart money decisions.
  • QuickBooks helps small businesses grow and run their business all in one place, including managing their books, getting paid fast, managing capital, and paying employees with confidence.
  • Mailchimp provides an all-in-one marketing platform that empowers small business customers to start and grow their businesses by helping them get their business online, market their business, and manage customer relationships.

Our mission-driven culture, dynamic team, and entrepreneurial spirit drives innovation that makes a real difference for millions of customers around the world.

Intuit Benefits

4.6
★★★★★
3 Ratings

Employer Summary

Intuit offers an amazing suite of benefits designed to support you and your family's health and well-being and provide the tools you need to learn, grow, and make an impact.

To start with, you'll be eligible for best-in-class medical, dental, and vision benefits on your first day of work. And our Well-Being for Life program offers reimbursement for many other expenses related to physical, emotional, family support and financial well-being. Health Savings Accounts and Life & Accident Insurance plans provide added peace of mind so you can focus on living your best life. Health and wellness is a top priority in our workplace as well. That's why we provide meditation and mindfulness programs and communities and most of our offices are equipped with state-of-the-art fitness centers managed by personal trainers that provide free group exercise classes and our cafes and break rooms provide healthy food options.

We're also committed to helping our employees stay financially fit, with benefits like free financial counseling, a generous 401(k) Savings Plan, and our Employee Stock Purchase Plan to help you pursue your own path to prosperity.

You'll also get solid support for your professional development at Intuit. With access to workshops, training events, and other educational resources, our culture of continuous learning will drive your professional growth.

*Please note that not all benefits apply for each location. To search for benefits that apply in your location, visit intuitbenefits.com.
